name: Odyssey 1157
description:
In this one-player adventure your quest is to make it home to your family in Avignon. Along the way you will be bombarded by a variety of mythological creatures found within illuminated text from the 12th-13th century.

                This quest will not be easy [at least the first screen of this demo I keep dying], for you must battle the hideous fiends and friends who stalk the land. Fortunately, the longer you survive, the greater your Experience and the less vulnerable your troubled soul.

                Secrets to this adventure can be found as you wander around cities friendly to the European Crusaders. Stop and talk to villagers because these helpful strangers will give you clues [maybe] (Simon’s Quest 4).
